verses.text: Now therefore \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and unto the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which I \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* you, for to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add*, that ye may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* you.

Ye shall not \w add|strong="H3254"\w* unto the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you, neither shall ye \w diminish|strong="H1639"\w* \add ought\add* from it, that ye may \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* you.

Your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* what the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* because of \w Baal-peor|strong="H1187"\w*: for all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w Baal-peor|strong="H1187"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

But ye that did \w cleave|strong="H1695"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add are\add* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* every one of you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* you \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, even \w as|strong="H0834"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me, that ye should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* so \w in|strong="H7130"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither ye \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* therefore and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add them;\add* for this \add is\add* your \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and your \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*, which shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* all these \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \add is\add* a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

For what \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \add is there so\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, who \add hath\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add so\add* \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* unto them, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* in all \add things that\add* we \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon him \add for\add*?

And what \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \add is there so\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, that hath \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add so\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* as all this \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, which I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?

Only take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to thyself, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w diligently|strong="H3966"\w*, lest thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* the \w things|strong="H1697"\w* which thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, and lest they \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: but \w teach|strong="H3045"\w* them thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*;

\add Specially\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that thou \w stoodest|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*, when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Gather|strong="H6950"\w* me the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, and I will make them \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, that they may \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* me all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that they shall \w live|strong="H2416"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, and \add that\add* they may \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

And ye came \w near|strong="H7126"\w* and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* under the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*; and the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w burned|strong="H1197"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* unto the \w midst|strong="H3820"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, with \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*, \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w*, and thick \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.\f + \fr 4.11 \ft midst: Heb. heart\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto you out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: ye \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, but \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* no \w similitude|strong="H8544"\w*; \w only|strong="H2108"\w* \add ye heard\add* a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.\f + \fr 4.12 \ft only…: Heb. save a voice\f*

And he \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* unto you his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you to \w perform|strong="H6213"\w*, \add even\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w*; and he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* them upon \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* you \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, that ye might \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither ye go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

Take ye therefore \w good|strong="H3966"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* unto \w yourselves|strong="H5315"\w*; for ye \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* no manner of \w similitude|strong="H8544"\w* on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto you in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*:

Lest ye \w corrupt|strong="H7843"\w* \add yourselves\add*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* you a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, the \w similitude|strong="H8544"\w* of any \w figure|strong="H5566"\w*, the \w likeness|strong="H8403"\w* of \w male|strong="H2145"\w* or \w female|strong="H5347"\w*,

The \w likeness|strong="H8403"\w* of any \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* that \add is\add* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w likeness|strong="H8403"\w* of any \w winged|strong="H3671"\w* \w fowl|strong="H6833"\w* that \w flieth|strong="H5774"\w* in the \w air|strong="H8064"\w*,

The \w likeness|strong="H8403"\w* of any thing that \w creepeth|strong="H7430"\w* on the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, the \w likeness|strong="H8403"\w* of any \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*:

And lest thou lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* unto \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and when thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, and the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w*, and the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*, \add even\add* all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, shouldest be \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* them, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* unto all \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* under the whole \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.\f + \fr 4.19 \ft divided: or, imparted\f*

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* you, and brought you \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w*, \add even\add* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to be unto him a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, as \add ye are\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Furthermore the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with me for your \w sakes|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* that I should not go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and that I should not \w go|strong="H0935"\w* in unto that \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add for\add* an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*:

But I must \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, I must not go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: but ye shall go \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* that \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* unto yourselves, lest ye \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which he \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with you, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* you a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, \add or\add* the \w likeness|strong="H8544"\w* of \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \add thing\add*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w forbidden|strong="H6680"\w* thee.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* a \w consuming|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add even\add* a \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

¶ When thou shalt \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and ye shall have remained \w long|strong="H3462"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and shall \w corrupt|strong="H7843"\w* \add yourselves\add*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, \add or\add* the \w likeness|strong="H8544"\w* of any \add thing\add*, and shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to provoke him to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*:

I \w call|strong="H5749"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* to \w witness|strong="H5749"\w* against you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that ye shall \w soon|strong="H4118"\w* \w utterly|strong="H0006"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* from off the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whereunto ye go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it; ye shall not \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add your\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* upon it, but shall \w utterly|strong="H8045"\w* be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* you among the \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*, and ye shall be \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w few|strong="H4962"\w* in \w number|strong="H4557"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whither the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w lead|strong="H5090"\w* you.

And there ye shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* and \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, which neither \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, nor \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, nor \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, nor \w smell|strong="H7306"\w*.

But if from thence thou shalt \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou shalt \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add him\add*, if thou \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* him with all thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and with all thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

When thou art in \w tribulation|strong="H6862"\w*, and all these \w things|strong="H1697"\w* are \w come|strong="H4672"\w* upon thee, \add even\add* in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, if thou \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and shalt be \w obedient|strong="H8085"\w* unto his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*;\f + \fr 4.30 \ft are…: Heb. have found thee\f*

(For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* a \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*;) he will not \w forsake|strong="H7503"\w* thee, neither \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* thee, nor \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto them.

For \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* now of the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that are \w past|strong="H7223"\w*, which \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \add ask\add* from the one \w side|strong="H7097"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* unto the other, whether there hath been \add any such thing\add* as this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add*, or hath been \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* like it?

Did \add ever\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* speaking \w out|strong="H1696"\w* of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, as thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*?

Or hath \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w assayed|strong="H5254"\w* to \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* him a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of \add another\add* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, by \w temptations|strong="H4531"\w*, by \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*, and by \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*, and by \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and by a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and by a stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and by \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w terrors|strong="H4172"\w*, according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* for you in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* before your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*?

Unto thee it was \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w*, that thou mightest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* he \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \add there is\add* none \w else|strong="H5750"\w* beside \w him|strong="H0905"\w*.

Out of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* he made thee to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, that he might \w instruct|strong="H3256"\w* thee: and upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* he \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* thee his \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; and thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* his \w words|strong="H1697"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And because he \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, therefore he \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, and brought thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* in his \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* with his \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*;

To drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* and \w mightier|strong="H6099"\w* than thou \add art\add*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee in, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add for\add* an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Know|strong="H3045"\w* therefore this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w consider|strong="H7725"\w* \add it\add* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* he \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, and upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* beneath: \add there is\add* none else.

Thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* therefore his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that it may go \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with thee, and with thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, and that thou mayest \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add thy\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, for ever.

¶ Then \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w severed|strong="H0914"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* toward the \w sunrising|strong="H8121"\w*;

That the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* might \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* thither, which should \w kill|strong="H7523"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w unawares|strong="H1097"\w*, and \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* him not in \w times|strong="H8543"\w* \w past|strong="H8032"\w*; and that \w fleeing|strong="H5127"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of \w these|strong="H0411"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* he might \w live|strong="H2425"\w*:

\add Namely\add*, \w Bezer|strong="H1221"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, in the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, of the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*; and \w Ramoth|strong="H7216"\w* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, of the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*; and \w Golan|strong="H1474"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, of the \w Manassites|strong="H4520"\w*.

¶ And this \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

These \add are\add* the \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*, and the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, after they came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

On this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w Beth-peor|strong="H1047"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, who \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, whom \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w*, after they were come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

And they \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \add were\add* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* toward the \w sunrising|strong="H4217"\w*;

From \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, even unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sion|strong="H7865"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*,

And all the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*, even unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*, under the \w springs|strong="H0794"\w* of \w Pisgah|strong="H6449"\w*.
